name: De'Vine: World of Shadows
description: De'Vine is a classic JRPG with an engaging STORY. Explore a very large open-world, with full CARD and FARMING systems! An intense BATTLE system and vast character customization! 50+ Hours of content!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
